channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump goes off script in UN address, praising Germany for returning to nuclear energy and fossil fuels: ‘All green is all bankrupt’
item.description: In remarks tied to the UN week, Trump repeated the argument that Europe—and specifically Germany—turned back to traditional fuels after pursuing renew...

item.title: The Trump Vengeance Tour Is Coming to a Stadium Near You
item.description: The MAGA movement’s encirclement maneuver is gaining ground.

item.title: Mamdani draws NYC investors to advise him if he wins mayor race
item.description: Members of NYC's business community are forming an advisory group in an effort to guide the mayoral candidate if he wins the election in November.

item.title: Powell Stresses ‘Challenging Situation’ for Fed as Rate Debate Intensifies
item.description: Rising inflation and a weakening labor market have created a bind for the central bank, Jerome H. Powell, its chair, warned on Tuesday.

item.title: Zackery Nazario Died Subway Surfing. Is Social Media to Blame?
item.description: Norma Nazario didn’t understand what had motivated her 15-year-old son to subway surf. Then she found his phone.

item.title: Warren Buffett retires from Berkshire Hathaway in 100 days—and Apple could be on the chopping block
item.description: Berkshire’s accelerated Apple selling is predicted to pick up upon Buffett's retirement.

item.title: Jury to Decide Fate of Ryan Routh, Man Accused of Trying to Assassinate Trump
item.description: The man accused of lying in wait with a rifle at a Florida golf course in 2024 mounted his own defense in a 12-day trial.

item.title: Top analyst says the U.S. bull market dates all the way back to the 1980s, and stocks just hit a potentially unsustainable 363% of GDP
item.description: It was only 212% at the height of the dotcom bubble, according to calculations by JP Morgan Asset Management's David Kelly.

item.title: Milei’s peso is 20% overvalued and fragile, analysts say

item.title: Saudi Grand Mufti, an Archconservative in a Changing Kingdom, Dies
item.description: The death of Abdulaziz Al Asheikh, Saudi Arabia’s most senior cleric, was the symbolic end of an era as the kingdom transforms.

item.title: Trump Pushes E.U. to Stop Buying Oil and Gas From Russia
item.description: The European Union has sharply reduced its dependence on Russian energy, but it still imports some supplies.

item.title: Saudi Grand Mufti, an Archconservative in a Changing Kingdom, Dies
item.description: The death of Abdulaziz Al Asheikh, Saudi Arabia’s most senior cleric, was the symbolic end of an era as the kingdom transforms.

item.title: Live Updates: Trump Attacks U.N. and Lectures Nations in Address to General Assembly

item.title: Trump Claims Again at the U.N. That He Ended 7 Wars. Here’s a Closer Look.
item.description: During his speech, the president also disparaged the work of the United Nations, which, he said, “did not even try to help” in any of the conflicts.
